=== How to create a new translation? ===

 # If interface language does not exist, add language and fill all fields correctly: Service -> Localization -> Languages -> Add 
 # Translate phrases: Service -> Localization -> Translation variants
 # Make sure that the language has appear in the list of available translations: Service -> Localization -> Translations
